DataElement.preferredName: Participant Current Smoking Cessation Program Exclusion Criteria Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator related to whether the participant is currently in a smoking cessation program that prevent a subject from being allowed to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Participant Current Smoking Cessation Program Exclusion Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Someone who takes part in an activity._Occurring in or belonging to the present time._Discontinuation of the habit of smoking._A broad framework of goals to be achieved._Medical and/or social characteristics that prevent a subject from being allowed to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Someone who takes part in an activity.

Concepts.definition: Someone who takes part in an activity.

Property.preferredName: Current Smoking Cessation Program Exclusion Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.:Discontinuation of the habit of smoking.:A broad framework of goals to be achieved.:Medical and/or social characteristics that prevent a subject from being allowed to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol.

Concepts.definition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.
Discontinuation of the habit of smoking.
A broad framework of goals to be achieved.
Medical and/or social characteristics that prevent a subject from being allowed to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
